description.text: Demonstrate your readiness by completing two tasks: Obtain a Leafcutter Ant Pupa, which can be placed on dirt to start a Leafcutter Ant colony. And build a sandcastle to protect turtle eggs. Then, and only then, will I bestow this weapon upon you.
Congratulations! Here it is. The shulk's influence has transformed the weapon beyond recognition, engulfing its original form entirely.
